Title.ui:help: The title of your data package

Description.ui:help: A description of your data package

Version.ui:help: A version number for the data package

Language.ui:help: The language of the data package

Collected.ui:help: Indicate when collecting the data for this data package started and ended

Start_Date.ui:help: Indicate when you've started collecting the data for this data package

End_Date.ui:help: Indicate when you've finished collecting the data for this data package

Covered_Geolocation_Place.ui:description: Indication of the geographical entities, like countries, regions and cities, covered with this data package (English naming convention preferred)

Covered_Period.ui:help: An indication of the period covered by your data package

Start_Date.ui:help: An indication of the start date of the period covered by your data package

End_Date.ui:help: An indication of the end date of the period covered by your data package

Tag.ui:description: Free text field for adding (searchable) key words to your data package

Title.ui:help: Title of the related data package

Persistent_Identifier.ui:help: Persistent identifier of the related data package

Identifier_Scheme.ui:help: Type of Persistent identifier of the related data package

Identifier.ui:help: The identifier as it can be resolved on the appropriate service

Retention_Period.ui:help: The minimal number of years the data will be kept in the archive

Retention_Information.ui:help: Provide the reason when you deviate from the minimum of 10 years retention of the data package

Embargo_End_Date.ui:help: If there is an embargo on the data package; when will it end?

Data_Classification.ui:help: How is your data classified with regards to information security policy

Collection_Name.ui:help: Collection this data package is a part of. E.g. Project Name

Funder_Name.ui:help: The name(s) of the organisation(s) funding the research. E.g. NWO

Award_Number.ui:help: The award or grant number issued by the funding organisation

Creator.ui:description: The person(s) who created (a version of) the data package.

Affiliation.ui:description: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the creator

Person_Identifier.ui:description: Person identifier of creator of the data package

Name_Identifier_Scheme.ui:help: What type of person identifier is used? (e.g. an ORCID, DAI, or ScopusID)

Name_Identifier.ui:help: Identifier as it can be resolved on the appropriate service

Contributor.ui:description: The person(s) who have contributed to this data package

Contributor_Type.ui:help: The type of contributor. List of values is derived from DataCite

Affiliation.ui:description: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the contributor

Person_Identifier.ui:description: Person identifier of contributor of the data package

Name_Identifier_Scheme.ui:help: What type of person identifier is used? (e.g. an ORCID, DAI, or ScopusID)

Name_Identifier.ui:help: Identifier as it can be resolved on the appropriate service

License.ui:help: The license under which you offer the data package for use by third parties. Preferred value is CC BY

Data_Access_Restriction.ui:help: Once archived, how is your data package accessible to third parties?
